# About

This book is to be used as a resource for vascular surgery trainees as a quick reference in caring for the vascular surgery patient based on the must up to date available evidence.

## Usage 

The goal is to have this be a quick reference with clear citations of evidence for the perioperative management of the vascular surgery patient.  Save this book in a place where you can find an navigate it easily.
